channel.title: Creating an image :: Zymbit Workshop
channel.description: Starting Pi Imager When you first start the Pi Imager, you’ll see that you have to make some choices: First, you’ll want to choose which Pi model you have. We’re using Pi 4s Next, you’ll choose the Operating System. We are going to use the most recent version (Bookworm, 64-bit), but we won’t be needing the full Desktop environment, so choose the ‘Lite’ version. Next, you’ll identify the Micro SD Card you’d like to write to.
